param.name: count_website_list

param.name: occ_row_limit

column.name: common_name
column.sql: jsonb_object_agg(distinct cttl_common.id, cttl_common.taxon ORDER BY cttl_common.taxon ASC) filter (where cttl_common.id is not null)

column.name: synonym
column.sql: jsonb_object_agg(distinct cttl_synonym.id, cttl_synonym.taxon ORDER BY cttl_synonym.taxon ASC) filter (where cttl_synonym.id is not null)
